control.name: icbTickStyle
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the location of tick marks within a track bar.

control.name: checkEditVertical
control.description: If checked, the track bar is vertically oriented. In this instance, the scroll box moves from bottom to top as the track bar's value increases.

control.name: seMinimum
control.description: Specifies the track bar's minimum value.

control.name: seMaximum
control.description: Specifies the track bar's maximum value.

control.name: seSmallChange
control.description: Specifies the small change. This value is added to or subtracted from the Value property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.

control.name: seLargeChange
control.description: Specifies the large change. This value is added to or subtracted from the Value property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.

control.name: ceShowValue
control.description: Specifies whether to show tooltips when hovering over the thumbs.

control.name: ceShowCustomValue
control.description: Allows you to provide custom tooltips for the thumbs.
